field.name: authorization_server_endpoint
field.label: Authorization Server Endpoint
field.description: The URL to your (openidconnect) authorization server endpoint

field.name: after_login_redirect_uri
field.label: After login uri
field.description: Uri to navigate to after login.

field.name: disable_ssl_check
field.label: Disable SSL check
field.description: When enabled, it disables the SSL check on the authorization server endpoint.

field.name: kid
field.label: Key ID
field.description: Key ID of the tokens given by the authorization server

field.name: cert
field.label: Public key
field.description: Public key associated with the key id. This is used to verify the tokens given by the authorization server.

field.name: client_id
field.label: Client ID
field.description: Client ID as set in the authorization server.

field.name: client_secret
field.label: Client secret
field.description: Client secret as set in the authorization server.
